packageInclusions.makkahAccommodation: Hilton Convention Hotel or similar in front of Haram with Breakfast.
packageInclusions.madinahAccommodation: Al-Aqeeq Madinah or similar in front of Haram with Breakfast.
packageInclusions.transportation: Complete private, luxury transport from Jeddah Airport- Makkah Hotel- Madinah Hotel- Madinah Airport.
packageInclusions.sightseeing: Explore The Journey Of Beautiful And Historical Places In Mecca & Medina.
packageInclusions.visa: A Saudi Tourist Visa is included.

whatToExpect: Professional meet and greet service upon arrival.
24-hour dedicated support service throughout your stay in Makkah and Madinah.
Online in-person preparatory session for Umrah guidance.

hotelDetailsMakkah.name: Mövenpick Hilton Convention
hotelDetailsMakkah.description:
Located in one of the tallest buildings in the world and overlooking the holy Grand Mosque, Makkah Tower combines traditions with modern comforts. It features in-house shops and fine dining options.

Offering free WiFi, rooms at Mövenpick Hotel & Residence Makkah Hotel are decorated with contemporary wooden furnishings, most facing the Masjid al-Haram and the sacred K’aba. All rooms are equipped with a flat-screen satellite TV, tea/coffee making facilities and a minibar.

Guests can enjoy gourmet Saudi specialities at the Al Naim restaurant and an array of international classics at the Al Firdaous buffet bistros. Al Diwan Tea Lounge serves Arabic coffee and selected tea blends.

hotelDetailsMadinah.name: Al-Aqeeq Madinah
hotelDetailsMadinah.description:
Al-Aqeeq Madinah Hotel is located in Medina, just a few steps from the holy Haram. Guests can enjoy free WiFi throughout the property. Rooms here will provide you with a flat-screen satellite TV, air conditioning and a mini-bar. Featuring a shower, private bathrooms also come with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Suites have a living room. Room service is available 24 hours.

At Al-Aqeeq Madinah you will find a 24-hour front desk and a mini-market on site. Other facilities offered include 2 restaurants, a coffee shop and shops (on site). The hotel is 1.9 mi from Al Noor Mall and 2 mi from Madina Mall. The property offers on-site parking upon availability

transportationServices: Complete private, luxury transport from Jeddah Airport- Makkah Hotel- Madinah Hotel- Madinah Airport.

visaInformation.title: Saudi Tourist E-Visa
visaInformation.description: The E-Visa will be a one-year, multiple entry visa, allowing tourists to spend up to 90 days in the country. The tourist visa allows you to take part in tourism-related activities such as, events, family & relatives visits, leisure, and Umrah (excluding Hajj) and excludes other activities such as studying.
